faq.title: Your top questions
faq.a1: You can browse through the listed items on our platform and send a request to borrow. Once the owner approves, we'll facilitate the exchange by confirming pickup or delivery details. Payment or deposit (if required) will be processed securely through our system.
faq.a2: Creating an account and browsing is free. However, small service fees may apply when you borrow or lend an itemÃ¢â‚¬â€these cover platform maintenance, verification, and support services. All costs will be shown clearly before confirming any transaction.
faq.a3: Simply create a listing by uploading clear photos, adding a short description, and setting your lending terms (such as duration and price). Once approved, your item will appear for borrowers to request. You'll receive notifications when someone is interested.
faq.a4: We encourage both parties to inspect items before and after each transaction. If damage occurs, our support team will review the situation and mediate a fair resolution. Depending on the agreement, repair or replacement costs may be covered by the borrower or through our protection policy.
